rows.label: tlk41200121_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, listen - I heard Peline from
Cmalaf Artwork was looking for a
new owner to support her business.

rows.label: tlk41200121_03_msg0002
rows.name:
But she won't accept just anyone.
It has to be someone who really
appreciates artwork.

rows.label: tlk41200121_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Maybe if you helped her increase her
lineup or bought everything she's
selling, she'd trust you enough to offer.

rows.label: tlk41200121_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But what kind of benefits do you even
get for owning a shop, anyway?
